comment:
* Configure the {@link MediaProjection} session requested from
 * {@link MediaProjectionManager#createScreenCaptureIntent(MediaProjectionConfig)}.

variables.name: CAPTURE_REGION_USER_CHOICE
variables.comment:
* The user, rather than the host app, determines which region of the display to capture.
     * @hide

variables.name: CAPTURE_REGION_FIXED_DISPLAY
variables.comment:
* The host app specifies a particular display to capture.
     * @hide

variables.name: mDisplayToCapture
variables.comment:
* The particular display to capture. Only used when {@link #getRegionToCapture()} is
     * {@link #CAPTURE_REGION_FIXED_DISPLAY}; ignored otherwise.
     *
     * Only supports values of {@link android.view.Display#DEFAULT_DISPLAY}.

variables.name: mRegionToCapture
variables.comment: * The region to capture. Defaults to the user's choice.

methods.name: public static MediaProjectionConfig createConfigForDefaultDisplay()
methods.comment: * Returns an instance which restricts the user to capturing the default display.

methods.name: public static MediaProjectionConfig createConfigForUserChoice()
methods.comment:
* Returns an instance which allows the user to decide which region is captured. The consent * dialog presents the user with all possible options. If the user selects display capture, * then only the {@link android.view.Display#DEFAULT_DISPLAY} is supported. * *

* When passed in to * {@link MediaProjectionManager#createScreenCaptureIntent(MediaProjectionConfig)}, the consent * dialog shown to the user will be the same as if just * {@link MediaProjectionManager#createScreenCaptureIntent()} was invoked. *

methods.name: private static String captureRegionToString(int value)
methods.comment: * Returns string representation of the captured region.

methods.name: public int getDisplayToCapture()
methods.comment:
* The particular display to capture. Only used when {@link #getRegionToCapture()} is
     * {@link #CAPTURE_REGION_FIXED_DISPLAY}; ignored otherwise.
     *
     * Only supports values of {@link android.view.Display#DEFAULT_DISPLAY}.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public int getRegionToCapture()
methods.comment:
* The region to capture. Defaults to the user's choice.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull android.os.Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull android.os.Parcel dest, int flags)
